name: Piano Racer (itch)
description:
Enter the artistic delirium of these composers and experience the race for personal fulfillment!

Piano is a single player game...the objective is clear...keep the piano on the red carpet...

Attention:

Gamepad Recommended for the Windows version.
Mac version does not support Gamepad at the moment. Sorry!

Credits:

The original idea come from Ludum Dare 31

David Collado @davidcollado

David Llanos @davidllanos22
